price: وە دەسەڵات وگەورەی تەنھا بۆ ئەوە لەھەموو ئاسمانەکان وزەویدا وە ھەر ئەو زاڵ وباڵادەست ودانا وکار سازە
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-kib'riyāu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
